title: Check Course Prerequisites
description: A curriculum committee member needs to verify the official prerequisites for an existing course before approving a new, dependent course.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the target course.

tasks.description: Retrieve the official prerequisite information from the curriculum management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the prerequisite for 'CHEM301' is 'CHEM201 with a grade of C or better'.

tasks.description: Provide the verified prerequisite information to the committee member.
